extendedIngredients.name: chocolate chip cookies
extendedIngredients.originalString: 1 (13.75 ounce) package crunchy chocolate chip cookies

recipes.title: Dorm Life Eats: No-Bake Chocolate Chip Cookie Treats

winePairing.pairingText: Cream Sherry, Moscato d'Asti, and Port are my top picks for Treat. A common wine pairing rule is to make sure your wine is sweeter than your food. Delicate desserts go well with Moscato d'Asti, nutty desserts with cream sherry, and caramel or chocolate desserts pair well with port. The NV Solera Cream Sherry with a 4.5 out of 5 star rating seems like a good match. It costs about 17 dollars per bottle.

productMatches.title: NV Solera Cream Sherry
productMatches.description: The Solera Cream Sherry has a brilliant amber and deep copper hue. With butterscotch and pecan aromas, the sweet salted nut and brown spice aromas carry a complex caramel accent. A sweet entry leads to a rounded, lush, moderately full-bodied palate with a lengthy, flavorful finish.

recipes.instructions: Grease an 8x8" pan. Place cookies in a plastic bag, or food processor, and mash (or grind) until only small pieces remain.Grease a microwavable bowl. Microwave butter and marshmallows for 1 to 3 minutes for until marshmallows are puffed.Stir in cookies and quickly transfer to greased pan. Spread mixture into an even layer. Let set for 10 minutes, and then cut* into 9 or 16 pieces.

steps.step: Place cookies in a plastic bag, or food processor, and mash (or grind) until only small pieces remain.Grease a microwavable bowl. Microwave butter and marshmallows for 1 to 3 minutes for until marshmallows are puffed.Stir in cookies and quickly transfer to greased pan.
Spread mixture into an even layer.
Let set for 10 minutes, and then cut* into 9 or 16 pieces.
